Package com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.state.battle

Class Summary
AddMOBTask AddMOBTask extends RealTimeTask to create and add a MOB to the BattleState.
AttachTask AttachTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that grabs a flag.
AttackTask AttackTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that initiates the attacking process.
ChatTask ChatTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that processes a chat message
CorrectionTask CorrectionTask extends RealTimeTask to correct the position of a character.
CreateSnowballTask CreateSnowballTask extends Task to define the task that generates a throwing snow ball action.
MoveCharacterTask MoveCharacterTask extends RealTimeTask to set the destination of the user controlled CharacterEntity.
MoveSnowballTask MoveSnowballTask extends RealTimeTask to initiate the throw motion of a snow ball.
RemoveMOBTask RemoveMOBTask extends RealTimeTask to define the task that removes an entity.
RespawnTask RespawnTask extends RealTimeTask to respawn a dead character.
ScoreTask ScoreTask extends RealTimeTask to score a win for the character.
StartGameTask StartGameTask extends RealTimeTask to start the actual snow ball battle.
UpdateCursorStateTask UpdateStateTask extends RealTimeTask to update all the corresponding values associated with mouse position.
